programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep2
programme.desc: Dungball Derby/Ace Of Race - When White Shadow is invited to play a daring sport against his hero, an athletic dung beetle, the crew is worried he doesn't know the game is fixed. // Chet gets taken by a con artist gecko and bets Turbo's shell. When Turbo is challenged, he must go slow to try to beat the gecko at his own game.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep2
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Giant Pumpkin - Pat has to deliver some pumpkins to Greendale School for the annual Halloween Pumpkin Party. But when he picks them up from Ted's workshop, Jess starts playing with a giant pumpkin and it rolls into the river and floats away. Pat follows it along the river and tries to fish it out with Alf's rod but the pumpkin is too heavy and the line breaks. As the party gets under way in Greendale, the giant pumpkin floats out to sea and Pat and Jess board the SDS Orca and head out into Pencaster Bay. With help from Chris Beacon and his radar machine they at last manage to locate the pumpkin then hurry back to Greendale just in time. Pat then surprises everyone by arriving with the giant pumpkin now carved with a big Jess face!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep2
programme.desc: The Case Of The Amazing Eyebrows - It's the day of the Best Toy Award in Toyland and Fuse is the winner! He's very excited but when his new dressing up eyebrows that he wanted to wear to the ceremony go missing, he's devastated. It's up the Noddy to investigate who has taken the amazing eyebrows so that he can get them back to Fuse before the ceremony starts. When the banner and the cup from the Award Ceremony go missing too the finger of suspicion points at Noddy and he must use all his investigating skills to clear his name and find out who has taken the missing eyebrows and why?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep54
programme.desc: Bumble's Afraid Of The Dark - Primrose and Violet are having a sleepover. When Bumble admits that he is scared of the dark, the tots try everything to stop him from being afraid

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep3
programme.desc: Little Sisters / Tricky Treasure - Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3
programme.desc: Boo to You - Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep3
programme.desc: The Lotus - Po's moral lines are blurred when he and Blade have to break an untrustworthy hedgehog monk (Zhen) out of jail to get more information on what Klaus and Veruca stole from the Lotus. They learn from Zhen that there are in fact three more weapons, and Po recognizes one of them from a comic book.

programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.desc: Spinny Water / Kelp's Song - Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep6
programme.desc: Playground / Sparkless - Cruz decides to turn the sunken ship into a park. But all his and Kelps fun-crastinating puts the project in jeopardy. / Kelp accidentally knocks a boulder into the stream, blocking the flow while trying his unicorn spark. Frustrated by magic, Kelp uses the narwhal way.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5
programme.desc: Pupcakes \ Stink or Swim - When Tag discovers that Scooch is a great baker, she encourages him to start a pupcake stand. But when Tag rounds up more customers than Scooch is prepared to handle, Scooch cant keep up with the demand. \ Tag and Scoochs race to pick up the most trash on Pawston Beach is thwarted by Frank and Beans, who just want to make more of a mess.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5
programme.desc: The Amazing Donna / Bye, Bye Boardie - When Donna decides to show off her not-so-flashy skills as a magician at the Community Center talent show, the Zenkos must do everything they can to save her act from becoming an embarrassing disaster. / After Sams favorite skateboard accidentally gets put in with donations Mr. Tanaka is collecting for a fundraiser, the team is led on a merry chase as the skateboard passes from one Harmony Harbor denizen to another.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep6
programme.desc: Lula's Last Stand / Triple Trouble - Little Lula has set up a lemonade stand, but shes not getting any business. The Zenkos swing into action to send customers her way. / When Donna, Fawna and Rona have a spat, the triplets longstanding annual tradition of viewing a comet together is in jeopardy. Now its up to Team Zenko to get the three feuding sisters back together again before the comet streaks by.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep5
programme.desc: Heavy Metal - The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep6
programme.desc: Iced Out - Frustrated that she's not fitting in with the team, Aggro goes off on her own with Elbone on a mission to save a dragon egg trapped in ice.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

With everything shut down for the day, Tag and Scooch take the opportunity to play all over town, while trying not to wake up other dogs.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep3
programme.desc: You (Don't) Snooze, You Lose / Save The Squasher - When the crew takes on a mission to help Ian get some rest for a Badminton Tournament, Jax realises that the biggest approach isn't always the best approach. / When Lula loses her comic book, Ari learns that the best heroes rely on teamwork and not gadgets.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep3

programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep5
programme.desc: Jin's New Look - On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctors coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Mortys five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruit Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep171
programme.desc: New Blue Jeans - Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites - Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Team Truck Challenge - Its the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Starla's Wild West Birthday - Starla's wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep810
programme.desc: Pups and Katie Stop the Barking Kitty Crew! / Pups Save the Glasses - When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. // Cap'n Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. a Neon Humdinger / Pups Save a Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep319
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Toy - The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Als field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep216
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley / The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path - Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravel's lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesn't have a bowling alley... until now!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S02 Ep217
programme.desc: The Crew Celebrates Builder Covegiving Day / The Crew Builds A Rocket Ship Ride - After Speed Meister sabotages Builder Covegiving Day, it's up to the pups to save the holiday for everyone in Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Crabby Wedding / The Cloud Kingdom - Dora's crab friends are getting married but Swiper swipes the ring and loses it in the ocean. Dora has to get the ring back!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep218
programme.desc: A Star Fish Is Born - When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Sharknapped! - When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Sharkdog Makes a Splash - The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep139
programme.desc: The Museum - Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Very Hot Day - It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep141
programme.desc: Chloe's Puppet Show - Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites - Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster - Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: One Last For The Road / The Little Critters - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same... // Barbabelle had a restless night because of all the insects!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Paddington's Earth Day Mission / Paddington's Special Spring Harvest Celebration - It'd Earth Day and Paddington has the important job of planting a tree, but will he find the perfect spot before it is too late?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep325
programme.desc: Pups Raise the PAW Patroller / Pups Save the Crows - Daring Dannys at it again, luckily the Pups are able to raise their rig after Danny sinks the Paw Patroller.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep326
programme.desc: Pups Save Floating Friends / Pups Save a Satellite - The aliens spaceship is on the fritz and shooting out anti-gravity rays. Ryder and the pups need to repair the spaceship.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep307
programme.desc: Best Finemies / Dinner with Bentley - When Baby and Shadow accidentally break a music box, the two unlikely partners team up to fix it. // The Sharks turn their home into a fancy restaurant to impress a snobby dinner guest.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices - While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Croc-A-Bye Baby / Wanna Eampaada? / If The Boot Fits / Piata Party - Dora and Boots babysit some rowdy crocs. // Dora and Boots get the Troll to try an empanada at Benny's stand. // Boots tries new wacky new boots that Tico invented.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep413
programme.desc: Construction Crew to the Rescue - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped at the top of a tall, rickety tower, Blaze, Stripes and Starla transform into awesome construction vehicles to build a way down.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Noodle Bowls / Spicy Cauliflower Bites - Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he can't seem to get any of his magic tricks right.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Pest Friends Forever - Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Sleeping Like a Baby - Sharkdog must go on a wild search around town to help Mia find her missing binky and get the baby back to sleep.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - After finding Grandpa's old time capsule, Baby and William go overboard making their own.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Pups Great Race / Pups Take the Cake - It's Race Day and the pups are about to race each other across the town to see who is the fastest. // Mr. Porter enters a cake competition and needs Ryder and the pups to help him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Runaway Rooster - Chickaletta and Roosterio run away from a chicken show and get stuck on top of a runaway drone.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town.

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Alebrije Adventure / Let's Get A Paleta - Ale the Alebrije asks Dora for her help! The Alebrije tree is wilting, so it's up to Dora to find its rainbow water. // On a super hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep213
programme.desc: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire - The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Button Bonanza / Moxie the Monster - The hamsters are convinced Arrow is mind-controlling the family using talking buttons. // When Harry pet-sits Jocelyn's gerbil, Clover discovers it's her old nemesis, Moxie.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep508
programme.desc: The Gold Medal Games - It's time for the Gold Medal Games, and Blaze is ready to compete! But when Crusher cheats and sends his rival flying far away, Blaze has to speed back to Axle City to beat the buzzer and win that medal!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it!

programme.title: DORA S02 Ep206
programme.desc: Partly Claudia / Ranita's Magic Stripes - Dora and Boots take Claudia, an energetic young rain cloud, to rain on a dry water slide.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Fins in the Water - Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Home Sweet Sharkdog - Max's new best friend, Sharkdog, comes home with him, but keeping him a secret from his parents is a challenge.

programme.title: Sharkdog S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Unfetch - When Sharkdog fetches items that belong to the residents of Foggy Springs, Max needs to help him return them all before anyone notices.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Barbazoo's Diary / The Great Reporter - Barbazoo have plenty of things to write about in his diary! // After reading the biography of Nellie Bly, Barbalib is determined to become a Great Reporter!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Private Club / Green Algae - Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S05 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep402
programme.desc: Pups Save a Teeny Penguin / Pups Save the Cat Show - Everest and Jake try to rescue a little penguin and end up floating out to sea on a homemade bridge. // Katie's kittens are all covered in mud and running amuck!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep308
programme.desc: Lannie's Lights / Assembly Required - When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine. // The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Ah! My Beautiful Castle / The Sand Is Running Away - During a bike ride, the Barbapapa family discovers an old medieval castle in ruins. // Barbapapa and Lolita were traveling in a balloon, but caught in a storm they ended up stranded on a deserted island.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it!

programme.title: DORA S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wonky Wishing Wand / Bip Bip's Big Show - Big Red Chicken's magic goes wonky and not only shrinks himself, but causes wacky things to happen throughout the rainforest. Dora has to fix it!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S04 Ep414
programme.desc: Officer Blaze - Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep216
programme.desc: Ceviche for Dinner - When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Surf's Up, Sharkdog! - When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Sharkdog S02 Ep218
programme.desc: A Star Fish Is Born - When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Petstravaganza - Vola throws a pet adoption party for the quirky critters at the pet fair.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Pups Save the Penguins / Pups Save a Dolphin Pup - Someone has been swiping fish off Capn Turbots boat, so he calls Ryder and the PAW Patrol to help investigate. // Dolphin Pup accidentally swims into a shallow water stream!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep801
programme.desc: Pups Save a Snowbound Cow - When Bettina wanders up Jake's mountain and gets caught in a snowstorm, it's up to the Paw Patrol to bring her safely down.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep123
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Fountain Show / The Crew Builds A Carousel - When Sierra Sparkle's big concert stage needs some extra sparkle, Rubble & Crew use a construction complication to make a big splash.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep237
programme.desc: Rebecca Rabbit - Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbits house today. It is a bit different to Peppas house; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep172
programme.desc: Everywhere at Once - Anna has prepared her ice cream for everyone but forgets to place it in the freezer. - as she is trying to help all her friends at once, the ice cream melts! Is it ruined or can it be saved?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep173
programme.desc: The Blue Butterfly - Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Celery & Hummus / Lettuce Wraps - Chef, Olly, Ruby and Henry compete in the annual Celeryjack Games. But Chef, who's used to winning, faces stiff competition this year.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Pancakes - Tiny Chef makes pancakes but loses his confidence when he breaks his special lucky pancake flipping spatula.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Jungle Horn - Stripes loves his jungle horn, a special instrument that can summon all the animals in the jungle. But when a jealous Crusher steals it Blaze and Stripes must speed after him in a wild chase to get it back

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Firefighters to the Rescue! - When three fire emergencies break out across Axle City, it's up to Blaze to put 'em out - and to do it, he'll transform into the most epic fire rescue vehicles we've ever seen!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813
programme.desc: Pups Save a Show Jumper / Pups Save the Salmon - Winnie Winnington goes looking for a frog to enter in a frog-jumping contest and ends up needing rescued in a swamp.

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea.

programme.desc: O - Dee encourages a friend to say 'o', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We meet an octopus and an orangutan, and see an ostrich in an office!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Me and My Shadow - When Messy breaks the lighthouse, things get shady. But without a shadow of a doubt, he and his friends save the day!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Fairy Tale - Dad tells Bluey and Bingo a real-life fairy tale about growing up in a wild place called the '80s, about a boy who was cursed when he was mean to his little brother.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jumping - Andy Day looks at a selection of baby animals as they learn valuable jumping skills, from the springbok and the jerboa to the arctic fox.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Stuck In The Mud - Two T-Rexes go in search of fun. But when they get stuck in the muddy swamps, they need some help from the biggest dinosaur around.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Mission: Magic Show - A little boy called Leo needs Sylvie's help performing his magic trick at show and tell.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep5

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - The Squirrels spot the strangest things in a rock pool - wriggling dots with tails.

programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the Squirrels want to play outside. What can they do?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.desc: Pass the Parcel - Lucky's Dad is outraged that modern Pass the Parcel has a present in every layer and changes the rules back to only having one prize in the middle, but Bingo is forever losing.

programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Lightning Bolt Blackout - When lightning strikes Academy Island, it causes a power cut. Can the Go Jetters rescue their trapped friends without the power they need to call for Click-ons?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: New Species - The team goes on a jungle expedition to find a mysterious creature. But while they race to discover a brand new species, something seems to be watching them from the treetops.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Work - In a game of 'Work', Dad hires Bluey and Bingo at his drainpipe factory. But when Bluey takes charge, Dad finds his new boss pretty tough, especially her no dancing rule.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Fairies - Bluey's house has fairies! Tails are being braided, stickers are everywhere, and Mum's got a peg beard. Now the family must band together to hunt for these invisible mischief-makers.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animals S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jumping - Andy Day looks at a selection of baby animals as they learn valuable jumping skills, from the springbok and the jerboa to the arctic fox.

programme.title: Andy's Dino Toybox S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Stuck In The Mud - Two T-Rexes go in search of fun. But when they get stuck in the muddy swamps, they need some help from the biggest dinosaur around.

programme.title: Dog Squad S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Mission: Magic Show - A little boy called Leo needs Sylvie's help performing his magic trick at show and tell.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Bowled Over - Sandy and Seaweed have invented a new game knocking down bottles with coconuts; they have called it 'Bowling'.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep9
programme.desc: The Tadpole Badge - The Squirrels spot the strangest things in a rock pool - wriggling dots with tails.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Kite Badge - It's a very windy day and the Squirrels want to play outside. What can they do?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Treehouse Badge - Duggee is cleaning the clubhouse so the Squirrels take refuge in the treehouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Solar Race: Australia - Glitch hopes to win a solar-powered race across the Australian outback.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Middle of the World City: Ecuador - Glitch and his Glitchbots pretend to be the Go Jetters.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep21
programme.desc: All Tracks Lead to Rome - Thomas is working on the Italian Railway, keen to prove to his new friend Gina that he is an expert in all things Italian.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Kite - Stanley helps Little Woo and Seamus fly their new kite. It gets stuck up a tree and breaks. Using leaves and sticks, they build a better one, only for that to get stuck.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC297
programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1802
programme.desc: Flyweight Contenders - The UFCs Womens Flyweight division has long been ruled by Valentina Shevchenko, but new contenders are on the rise. See Casey ONeill, Andrea Lee, Maycee Barber, and more fight their way toward the top of the 125-pound rankings.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep711
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Loma Lookboonme, Front Row: Tom Aspinall, Take 5: Michael Page, Day One: Jailton Almeida - Loma Lookboonme details her story from Muay Thai fights in rural Thailand to making history as the first Thai fighter in the UFC. We join interim heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall Front Row at Madison Square Garden for Jon Jones versus Stipe Miocic at UFC 309. Welterweight striker Michael Venom Page gives us his top 5 favorite heavy hitters in the UFC. Jailton Almeida walks us through his UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez.
